description: Number of nonisomorphic Steiner triple systems (STS's) S(2,3,v) on v = 6n+1 or 6n+3 points.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 304.
CRC Handbook of Combinatorial Designs, 1996, p. 70.
links: P. Kaski and P. R. J. Ostergard (Patric.Ostergard(AT)hut.fi), The Steiner triple systems of order 19
Index entries for sequences related to Steiner systems
example: There are 2 nonisomorphic STS's on 13 points.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
